Class Player

java.lang.Object
Player
public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
this class is for saving cards of every player and having access to them
Version:
1.0 (30.4.2021)
Author:
mohammad-hossein zeynal zadeh

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.util.ArrayList<Card> playerCards
    saves all cards of a player has
    private int wholeScore
    saves whole score of player cards

    Player()
    initializes playerCards arraylist and wholeScore
